alert.note: Alert for Butte (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 10:15PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. In South Dakota, Butte County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
